comment:
>>44514499

> [[ UI Messenger – Vyx ]]
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: Hey, do you know any good Explorers that would want to go hunting right now?
> [[ Vyx ]]: Yeah? I can ask around and shoot some names your way but they’re all just dudes from my guild.
> [[ Vyx ]]: If that’s cool with you?
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: Sure.
> [[ Vyx ]]: Alright, give me a few. I’m in the middle of something.

The only ‘quest hub’ you know of for party-searching is the tavern in Averron, though you’re sure there’s one on the message boards. You imagine with this many people here, someone might have set up something—perhaps on the bottom floor or outside.

Cheering erupts from around you, and you glance down onto the test chamber floor. It looks like another fight is about to start.

Super sorry about this—I wasn’t planning on running for long anyway—but I am dead tired from a party lastnight. I'm archiving here because I can no longer promise a quality thread. Hopefully I'll be able to pick back up in the next couple of days; thanks for the posts, as always.
name: BSO
